unreal.translation[0].definitions[0].def: an experience, situation etc that is unreal seems so strange that you think you must be imagining it
unreal.translation[0].definitions[0].exa: It seemed unreal to be sitting and talking to someone so famous.
unreal.translation[0].definitions[1].def: not related to real things that happen
unreal.translation[0].definitions[1].exa: Many people go into marriage with unreal expectations.
unreal.translation[0].definitions[2].exa: Our trip to Disneyland was unreal.
